Comments_List: I developed the skill of writing analytical essays in Farsi.
The strength of this course was helping students to understand persian culture and movies in a more detailed way and aid them in writing essays. I do not believe that this course had any weaknesses.
I would highly recommend this course to another student as it increases one's ability to understand and write in Farsi while learning about its culture in depth.
